name: Ultroid UserBot Via UltroidCli
description: The most advanced telegram userbot now has it's own Cli.

apiId.description: You api id, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

apiHash.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

session.description: Your session string. Can be added now, or after deploy. (The bot will NOT work without a session string!!)

herokuApi.description: Heroku API token. Mandatory for Heroku Deploy...

herokuAppName.description: Name of your Heroku app, given in the first blank on this page. To be added if deploying to heroku ONLY.
